messages.title: Adobe India Women In Tech Scholarship
messages.formattedText: Through the Adobe India Women in Technology Scholarship, we are striving towards creating gender equality in science, technology and engineering domains by encouraging women to excel in computing and technology and become future leaders and role models in the field.

messages.speech:
To be eligible for the 2019 Adobe India Women in Technology Scholarship, applicants must meet the following criteria:

You must be an Indian female citizen student, enrolled in a formal technology 4 year B.Tech education program or an Integrated ME/MS/MTech and should be completing it in Academic year 2019-20.
You should be pursuing a Major or Minor in the following streams: Computer Science/Engineering, Information Science, Data Science, Electrical/Electronics Engineering, Math and Computing.
To know more visit Adobe India scholarship page or visit the rethink wiki page, the link is provided below.

Anything else that you would like to know about?
